snippet: Woods said that because of lingering discomfort in his back and hip, he had elected to have surgery in hopes of returning to the PGA Tour in early 2016.
abstract: Tiger Woods undergoes back surgery for second time in 18 months, and will be sidelined for rest of 2015.
lead_paragraph: Woods said that because of lingering discomfort in his back and hip, he had elected to have surgery in hopes of returning to the PGA Tour in early 2016.

headline.main: Tiger Woods Done for Year After Surgery
headline.print_headline: Woods Is Done for the Year After Surgery
